snippet.title: Akatori - Official Trailer | Dames 4 Games Showcase March 2024
snippet.description:
Get another look at Akatori, including combat, various locations, and more from upcoming metroidvania game. In Akatori, you wield your staff to fight, jump, and explore diverse realms across different eras. Join Mako on her journey to build friendships, face formidable foes, and uncover ancient gods while discovering her true self. Akatori is coming to PC and Nintendo Switch.

#IGN #Gaming
